entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Cartier

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
